parameters.db_file: name of alternative database file to use

parameters.project_name: name of the project that sould be deleted
name of the project that sould be deleted

parameters.task_name: name of the task that sould be started
parameters.project_name: name of the project in which the task should be started
parameters.until: until what time you intend to do the task
parameters.for_: for how long do you intend to do the task

status.help: show information abut the currently running task

parameters.display: type of display that should be used; if this is not specified, it falls back to the settings

parameters.start_input: start date of the recap; if this is ommited, all tasks are included
parameters.end_input: end date of the recap; if this is ommitted, the same date as for start is assumed
parameters.project_name: restrict the recap to tasks of a certain project
parameters.id_: show the IDs of the tasks
parameters.tags_as_str: list of comma-seperated tags for either tasks or projects
parameters.task_tags_as_str: list of comma-seperated tags for tasks
parameters.project_tags_as_str: list of comma-seperated tags for projects

export.help: export all the tasks to a csv or json file

parameters.file_type: choose between json and csv as output format

parameters.set_: name and new value of the setting that should be changed

parameters.table_type: should a task or project be modified
parameters.specifier: ID of the task/name of the project that should be changed
parameters.value: the new value of the attribute
